name: Witch and Council
storyline:
Explore the dangerous yet mysterious space full of strange creatures with LULU.

Widy: a planet full of Mana particles in the air.
Widy has a similar environment to earth, however, due to the vast amount of Mana particles in the air, every creature has an innate ability to use magic.
On this planet, where various tribes and monsters have coexisted, a portal gate opens on day and chaos erupts.

LULU: the witch who is never satisfied.
She is also a well-known troublemaker in the Magic Academy.
She, who is looking to find powerful magic at all costs, eventually went into the innermost place of the academy. She stepped into the forbidden place.
What makes her become crazy about studying magic? And why did the council try to stop LULU?
summary: Make a group with attractive characters, build your deck and stave off the characteristic enemies in Witch and Council, a roguelike deckbuilder game. Your small choices will make great changes every moment. We invite you to the witch world full of diverse characters and interesting scenarios.
